entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times mixed with wet snow this morning. Local snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 07:23 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow changing to wet snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 07:23 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
